verbs.description: There [V: was] [ARG1: no official word that Kim had left the country Sunday and arrived in Singapore , hours before Trump] .
There was no official word that Kim [V: had] left the country Sunday and arrived in Singapore , hours before Trump .
There was no official word that [ARG0: Kim] had [V: left] [ARG1: the country] [ARGM-TMP: Sunday] and arrived in Singapore , hours before Trump .
There was no official word that [ARG1: Kim] had left the country Sunday and [V: arrived] [ARG4: in Singapore] , [ARGM-TMP: hours before Trump] .
